src_original: bodhijñānāgrasamprāptaṁ paśyati jñānasuprabham |  buddhasambhogakāyaṁ vā ātmānaṁ laghu paśyati || 121 ||
buddhaiśca bodhisattvaiśca pañcakāmaguṇairapi ||  pūjitaṁ paśyate bimbaṁ mahājñānasamaprabham || 122 ||
vajrasattvaṁ mahābimbaṁ vajradharmaṁ mahāśayam |  svabisbaṁ paśyate svapne guhyavajramahāyaśāḥ || 123 ||
